thread.title: Brian Watt
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Brian Watt

author: Brian Watt
title: Brian Watt
text:
Purchased a size 10 based on reviews that it was generous enough of a fit to allow a jumper to be worn also, it was tight across the shoulders.
Allowing that the lady in question does have broad shoulders, it did look a slim fit.
Returned for a size 12 which did fitted but with little room for a jumper.
Replacement was swift; more so as it was returnd between Christmas and New Year.
That said, I was delighted with the quality of the jacket, with first class service and prompt delivery, highly recommended.
